sk1.name: Spectral Dagger
sk1.desc: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.

sk2.name: Desolate
sk2.desc: Deals bonus pure damage when Spectre attacks an enemy hero who is alone.

sk3.name: Dispersion
sk3.desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

sk4.name: Haunt
sk4.desc: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to take the place of a given illusion.Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself. They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.

sk5.name: Reality
sk5.desc: Spectre physically possesses a chosen Haunt.
